title: Crime Alert 04.23.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.23.19
description:
Man is charged with murder three decades after his wife went missing. Her body still has not been found. Social media influencer faces up to 20 years for hiring homeless cousin to break into a home at gunpoint to steal a domain name. A paroled murderer sentenced to 20 more years after robbing a bank,
